colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007A *, ,(CES BLA MA RGYANG 'BOD BLA MA'I THUGS RJE BSKUL ZHING BYIN RLABS, BGUGS PA'I LCAGS KYU ZHES BYA BA 'DI YANG, BLA RGYUD CHOS RJE BSTAN PA RIN CHEN SOGS KYIS NAN CHER BSKUL BA LA BRTEN NAS RJE BTZUN BLA MA DAM PA RNAMS KYI BKAR 'BANGS THA CHUD CHOS SMRA BA BLO BZANG CHOS KYI RGYAL MTSAN GYIS, CHOS GRVA CHEN PO BKRA SHIS LHUN PO'I GTZUG LAG KHANG DU SBYAR BA'O,, ,,)
